type: Rough Terrain, Telescopic Boom Type Diesel Engine Driven Forklift Trucks
duration_in_months: There is no clear information provided. However, the suggested delivery date is March, 2024.
full_summary:
**Title:** Rough Terrain, Telescopic Boom Type Diesel Engine Driven Forklift Trucks
===========================

**Reference Number:** CB-8244-15869713
---------------------------

**Publication Date:** August 17, 2023
-----------------------------

**Tender Closing Date:** October 17, 2023, 14:00:00
-----------------------------------

**Solicitation Number:** W8475-236664/A
---------------------------

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
------------------------------------------

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
---------------------------------

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
-------------------------

**Trade Agreements:** 
The bid is subject to the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

**Description:** The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the procurement of rough terrain, telescopic boom type diesel engine driven forklift trucks. The delivery locations are:

* CFB Bagotville, 3 Wing Bagotville, Alouette, QC, G0V 1A0 - 3 units
* 3 CDSB Edmonton, ASU Major Equipment Section, 195 Ave Rhine Road, Bldg 236, Room 108, Edmonton, AB - 1 unit
* TEME Building, 3367 Windsor St, Halifax, NS, B3K 5G1 - 4 units
* 3 ASG Gagetown Supply Company, Major Equipment Section, Bldg B10, CFB Gagetown - 3 units
* 31 Svc Bn Technical Services Platoon, 701 Oxford Street East, London, ON N5Y 4T7 - 1 unit

The required quantities are 12 units, with an option to purchase an additional 4 units.

**Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence
-----------------------------

**Contact Information:** 
Alexandra McCann
alexandra.mccann
